+package com.example.teacherscheduler.model
+
+import androidx.room.Entity
+import androidx.room.PrimaryKey
+import java.text.SimpleDateFormat

+@Entity(tableName = "semesters")

+    val name: String, // e.g., "Fall 2024", "Spring 2025"

+    val isActive: Boolean = true,

+    }
+    
+    private fun loadLastSyncTime() {
+        viewModelScope.launch {
+            val settings = repository.getSettingsSync()
+            updateLastSyncTimeDisplay(settings.lastSyncTimestamp)
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun updateLastSyncTimeDisplay(timestamp: Long) {
+        if (timestamp > 0) {
+            val dateFormat = SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd, yyyy HH:mm", Locale.getDefault())
+            val formattedDate = dateFormat.format(Date(timestamp))
+            _lastSyncTime.value = "Last sync: $formattedDate"
+        } else {
+            _lastSyncTime.value = "Last sync: Never"
+        }
+    }
+    
+    fun saveSettings(
+        classNotificationsEnabled: Boolean,
+        meetingNotificationsEnabled: Boolean,
+        reminderMinutes: Int,
+        autoSyncEnabled: Boolean
+    ) {
+        viewModelScope.launch {
+            val currentSettings = repository.getSettingsSync()
+            val updatedSettings = currentSettings.copy(
+                classNotificationsEnabled = classNotificationsEnabled,
+                meetingNotificationsEnabled = meetingNotificationsEnabled,
+                defaultReminderMinutes = reminderMinutes,
+                autoSyncEnabled = autoSyncEnabled
+            )
+            repository.updateSettings(updatedSettings)
+        }
+    }
+    
+    fun performSync() {
+        viewModelScope.launch {
+            _syncInProgress.value = true
+            val timestamp = repository.performSync()
+            updateLastSyncTimeDisplay(timestamp)
+            _syncInProgress.value = false
+        }
+    }
+    
+    fun setCurrentSemester(semesterId: Long) {
+        viewModelScope.launch {
+            repository.setCurrentSemester(semesterId)
+        }
+    }
+}

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- app/src/main/java/com/example/teacherscheduler/ui/SemesterFragment.kt
+++ app/src/main/java/com/example/teacherscheduler/ui/SemesterFragment.kt
@@ -0,0 +1,221 @@
+package com.example.teacherscheduler.ui
+
+import android.app.DatePickerDialog
+import android.os.Bundle
+import android.view.LayoutInflater
+import android.view.View
+import android.view.ViewGroup
+import android.widget.Toast
+import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
+import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.R
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.databinding.FragmentSemesterBinding
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.model.Semester
+import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
+import java.util.Calendar
+import java.util.Date
+import java.util.Locale
+
+class SemesterFragment : Fragment() {
+    private var _binding: FragmentSemesterBinding? = null
+    private val binding get() = _binding!!
+    
+    private lateinit var viewModel: SemesterViewModel
+    private lateinit var adapter: SemesterAdapter
+    
+    private val calendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+    private val dateFormat = SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd, yyyy", Locale.getDefault())
+    
+    override fun onCreateView(
+        inflater: LayoutInflater,
+        container: ViewGroup?,
+        savedInstanceState: Bundle?
+    ): View {
+        _binding = FragmentSemesterBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false)
+        return binding.root
+    }
+    
+    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
+        super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)
+        
+        viewModel = ViewModelProvider(this)[SemesterViewModel::class.java]
+        
+        setupRecyclerView()
+        setupObservers()
+        setupListeners()
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupRecyclerView() {
+        adapter = SemesterAdapter(
+            onItemClick = { semester ->
+                showEditSemesterDialog(semester)
+            },
+            onSetCurrentClick = { semester ->
+                viewModel.setCurrentSemester(semester.id)
+                Toast.makeText(
+                    requireContext(),
+                    "${semester.name} set as current semester",
+                    Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
+                ).show()
+            }
+        )
+        
+        binding.recyclerViewSemesters.apply {
+            layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(requireContext())
+            adapter = this@SemesterFragment.adapter
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupObservers() {
+        viewModel.semesters.observe(viewLifecycleOwner) { semesters ->
+            adapter.submitList(semesters)
+            binding.textViewNoSemesters.visibility = if (semesters.isEmpty()) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupListeners() {
+        binding.fabAddSemester.setOnClickListener {
+            showAddSemesterDialog()
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun showAddSemesterDialog() {
+        val dialogBinding = FragmentSemesterDialogBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
+        
+        // Set default dates (current semester)
+        val startCalendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+        val endCalendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+        endCalendar.add(Calendar.MONTH, 4) // Default 4-month semester
+        
+        dialogBinding.editTextSemesterName.setText("")
+        dialogBinding.editTextStartDate.setText(dateFormat.format(startCalendar.time))
+        dialogBinding.editTextEndDate.setText(dateFormat.format(endCalendar.time))
+        dialogBinding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked = true
+        
+        setupDatePickers(dialogBinding, startCalendar, endCalendar)
+        
+        val dialog = AlertDialog.Builder(requireContext())
+            .setTitle(R.string.add_semester)
+            .setView(dialogBinding.root)
+            .setPositiveButton(R.string.save) { _, _ ->
+                val name = dialogBinding.editTextSemesterName.text.toString()
+                val startDate = startCalendar.time
+                val endDate = endCalendar.time
+                val isCurrentSemester = dialogBinding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked
+                
+                if (name.isBlank()) {
+                    Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Semester name cannot be empty", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+                    return@setPositiveButton
+                }
+                
+                val semester = Semester(
+                    name = name,
+                    startDate = startDate,
+                    endDate = endDate,
+                    isCurrentSemester = isCurrentSemester
+                )
+                
+                viewModel.addSemester(semester)
+                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Semester added", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            }
+            .setNegativeButton(R.string.cancel, null)
+            .create()
+        
+        dialog.show()
+    }
+    
+    private fun showEditSemesterDialog(semester: Semester) {
+        val dialogBinding = FragmentSemesterDialogBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
+        
+        // Set existing semester data
+        val startCalendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+        startCalendar.time = semester.startDate
+        
+        val endCalendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+        endCalendar.time = semester.endDate
+        
+        dialogBinding.editTextSemesterName.setText(semester.name)
+        dialogBinding.editTextStartDate.setText(dateFormat.format(startCalendar.time))
+        dialogBinding.editTextEndDate.setText(dateFormat.format(endCalendar.time))
+        dialogBinding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked = semester.isCurrentSemester
+        
+        setupDatePickers(dialogBinding, startCalendar, endCalendar)
+        
+        val dialog = AlertDialog.Builder(requireContext())
+            .setTitle(R.string.edit_semester)
+            .setView(dialogBinding.root)
+            .setPositiveButton(R.string.save) { _, _ ->
+                val name = dialogBinding.editTextSemesterName.text.toString()
+                val startDate = startCalendar.time
+                val endDate = endCalendar.time
+                val isCurrentSemester = dialogBinding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked
+                
+                if (name.isBlank()) {
+                    Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Semester name cannot be empty", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+                    return@setPositiveButton
+                }
+                
+                val updatedSemester = semester.copy(
+                    name = name,
+                    startDate = startDate,
+                    endDate = endDate,
+                    isCurrentSemester = isCurrentSemester
+                )
+                
+                viewModel.updateSemester(updatedSemester)
+                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Semester updated", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            }
+            .setNegativeButton(R.string.cancel, null)
+            .setNeutralButton(R.string.delete) { _, _ ->
+                viewModel.deleteSemester(semester)
+                Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Semester deleted", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            }
+            .create()
+        
+        dialog.show()
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupDatePickers(
+        dialogBinding: FragmentSemesterDialogBinding,
+        startCalendar: Calendar,
+        endCalendar: Calendar
+    ) {
+        // Start date picker
+        dialogBinding.editTextStartDate.setOnClickListener {
+            DatePickerDialog(
+                requireContext(),
+                { _, year, month, dayOfMonth ->
+                    startCalendar.set(Calendar.YEAR, year)
+                    startCalendar.set(Calendar.MONTH, month)
+                    startCalendar.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, dayOfMonth)
+                    dialogBinding.editTextStartDate.setText(dateFormat.format(startCalendar.time))
+                },
+                startCalendar.get(Calendar.YEAR),
+                startCalendar.get(Calendar.MONTH),
+                startCalendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH)
+            ).show()
+        }
+        
+        // End date picker
+        dialogBinding.editTextEndDate.setOnClickListener {
+            DatePickerDialog(
+                requireContext(),
+                { _, year, month, dayOfMonth ->
+                    endCalendar.set(Calendar.YEAR, year)
+                    endCalendar.set(Calendar.MONTH, month)
+                    endCalendar.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, dayOfMonth)
+                    dialogBinding.editTextEndDate.setText(dateFormat.format(endCalendar.time))
+                },
+                endCalendar.get(Calendar.YEAR),
+                endCalendar.get(Calendar.MONTH),
+                endCalendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH)
+            ).show()
+        }
+    }
+    
+    override fun onDestroyView() {
+        super.onDestroyView()
+        _binding = null
+    }
+}

binding.switchMeetingNotifications.isChecked, defaultReminderMinutes = reminderMinutes, autoSyncEnabled = binding.switchAutoSync.isChecked, currentSemesterId = <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"

            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textViewNotificationSettingsLabel" />

        <com.google.android.material.switchmaterial.SwitchMaterial
            android:id="@+id/switchMeetingNotifications"

            android:layout_height="48dp"

            android:checked="true"
            android:text="@string/enable_meeting_notifications"
            android:textColor="#CCCCCC"
            android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/switchClassNotifications" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/textViewReminderTimeLabel"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
            android:text="@string/reminder_time"
            android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium"
            android:textColor="@android:color/white"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/switchMeetingNotifications" />

            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"

            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textViewReminderTimeLabel">

            <RadioButton

                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="48dp"
                android:text="@string/five_minutes_before"

            <RadioButton
                android:id="@+id/radioButton10Min"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="48dp"
                android:text="@string/ten_minutes_before"

            <RadioButton

                android:layout_height="48dp"

            android:layout_height="wrap_content"

            android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium"
            android:textColor="@android:color/white"
            android:textStyle="bold"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/radioGroupReminderTime" />

        <com.google.android.material.switchmaterial.SwitchMaterial
            android:id="@+id/switchAutoSync"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="48dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
            android:checked="true"
            android:text="@string/auto_sync"
            android:textColor="#CCCCCC"
            android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textViewDataSyncLabel" />

        <Button
            android:id="@+id/buttonSyncNow"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
            android:text="@string/sync_now"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/switchAutoSync"
            app:layout_constraintWidth_max="300dp" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/textViewLastSyncTime"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
            android:text="@string/last_sync_never"
            android:textColor="#CCCCCC"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/buttonSyncNow" />

        <Button
            android:id="@+id/buttonSaveSettings"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
            android:text="@string/save"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textViewLastSyncTime"
            app:layout_constraintWidth_max="300dp" />

    </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

+    
+    private fun showEditSemesterDialog(semester: Semester) {
+        val dialogBinding = DialogSemesterBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
+        
+        // Set existing semester data
+        val startCalendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+        startCalendar.time = semester.startDate
+        
+        val endCalendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+        endCalendar.time = semester.endDate
+        
+        dialogBinding.editTextSemesterName.setText(semester.name)
+        dialogBinding.editTextStartDate.setText(dateFormat.format(startCalendar.time))
+        dialogBinding.editTextEndDate.setText(dateFormat.format(endCalendar.time))
+        dialogBinding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked = semester.isCurrentSemester
+        
+        setupDatePickers(dialogBinding, startCalendar, endCalendar)
+        
+        val dialog = AlertDialog.Builder(this)
+            .setTitle(R.string.edit_semester)
+            .setView(dialogBinding.root)
+            .setPositiveButton(R.string.save) { _, _ ->
+                val name = dialogBinding.editTextSemesterName.text.toString()
+                val startDate = startCalendar.time
+                val endDate = endCalendar.time
+                val isCurrentSemester = dialogBinding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked
+                
+                if (name.isBlank()) {
+                    Toast.makeText(this, "Semester name cannot be empty", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+                    return@setPositiveButton
+                }
+                
+                val updatedSemester = semester.copy(
+                    name = name,
+                    startDate = startDate,
+                    endDate = endDate,
+                    isCurrentSemester = isCurrentSemester
+                )
+                
+                viewModel.updateSemester(updatedSemester)
+                Toast.makeText(this, "Semester updated", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            }
+            .setNegativeButton(R.string.cancel, null)
+            .setNeutralButton(R.string.delete) { _, _ ->
+                viewModel.deleteSemester(semester)
+                Toast.makeText(this, "Semester deleted", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            }
+            .create()
+        
+        dialog.show()
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupDatePickers(
+        dialogBinding: DialogSemesterBinding,
+        startCalendar: Calendar,
+        endCalendar: Calendar
+    ) {
+        // Start date picker
+        dialogBinding.editTextStartDate.setOnClickListener {
+            DatePickerDialog(
+                this,
+                { _, year, month, dayOfMonth ->
+                    startCalendar.set(Calendar.YEAR, year)
+                    startCalendar.set(Calendar.MONTH, month)
+                    startCalendar.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, dayOfMonth)
+                    dialogBinding.editTextStartDate.setText(dateFormat.format(startCalendar.time))
+                },
+                startCalendar.get(Calendar.YEAR),
+                startCalendar.get(Calendar.MONTH),
+                startCalendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH)
+            ).show()
+        }
+        
+        // End date picker
+        dialogBinding.editTextEndDate.setOnClickListener {
+            DatePickerDialog(
+                this,
+                { _, year, month, dayOfMonth ->
+                    endCalendar.set(Calendar.YEAR, year)
+                    endCalendar.set(Calendar.MONTH, month)
+                    endCalendar.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, dayOfMonth)
+                    dialogBinding.editTextEndDate.setText(dateFormat.format(endCalendar.time))
+                },
+                endCalendar.get(Calendar.YEAR),
+                endCalendar.get(Calendar.MONTH),
+                endCalendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH)
+            ).show()
+        }
+    }

+package com.example.teacherscheduler.ui
+
+import android.os.Bundle
+import android.view.MenuItem
+import android.view.View
+import android.widget.Toast
+import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
+import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.databinding.ActivitySemesterSelectorBinding
+
+class SemesterSelectorActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
+    private lateinit var binding: ActivitySemesterSelectorBinding
+    private lateinit var viewModel: SemesterViewModel
+    private lateinit var adapter: SemesterAdapter
+    
+    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
+        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
+        binding = ActivitySemesterSelectorBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
+        setContentView(binding.root)
+        
+        setupToolbar()
+        
+        viewModel = ViewModelProvider(this)[SemesterViewModel::class.java]
+        
+        setupRecyclerView()
+        setupObservers()
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupToolbar() {
+        setSupportActionBar(binding.toolbar)
+        supportActionBar?.setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled(true)
+        supportActionBar?.title = "Select Semester"
+    }
+    
+    override fun onOptionsItemSelected(item: MenuItem): Boolean {
+        if (item.itemId == android.R.id.home) {
+            finish()
+            return true
+        }
+        return super.onOptionsItemSelected(item)
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupRecyclerView() {
+        adapter = SemesterAdapter(
+            onItemClick = { semester ->
+                viewModel.setCurrentSemester(semester.id)
+                Toast.makeText(
+                    this,
+                    "${semester.name} set as current semester",
+                    Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
+                ).show()
+                finish()
+            },
+            onSetCurrentClick = { semester ->
+                viewModel.setCurrentSemester(semester.id)
+                Toast.makeText(
+                    this,
+                    "${semester.name} set as current semester",
+                    Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
+                ).show()
+                finish()
+            }
+        )
+        
+        binding.recyclerViewSemesters.apply {
+            layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(this@SemesterSelectorActivity)
+            adapter = this@SemesterSelectorActivity.adapter
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupObservers() {
+        viewModel.semesters.observe(this) { semesters ->
+            adapter.submitList(semesters)
+            binding.textViewNoSemesters.visibility = if (semesters.isEmpty()) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE
+        }
+    }
+}

Great! Now we have all the necessary components for managing semesters in the Teacher Scheduler app. Let's summarize what we've created:

1. **SemesterViewModel** - Handles the business logic for semester operations
2. **SemesterManagementActivity** - Allows users to add, edit, and delete semesters
3. **SemesterSelectorActivity** - Allows users to select the current semester
4. **Updated SettingsActivity** - Added semester management options to the settings screen
5. **SignInActivity** - Allows users to sign in to sync data with the cloud

We've also updated the existing Repository class to handle semester operations and added the isSignedIn() method to the FirebaseService class.

These changes will allow users to:
1. Create and manage semesters
2. Set a current semester
3. Sign in to sync data with the cloud
4. Configure notification settings

The implementation follows the MVVM architecture pattern and integrates with the existing Room database and Firebase backend.

+package com.example.teacherscheduler.data
+
+import android.content.Context
+import android.content.SharedPreferences
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.model.AppSettings
+
+class SettingsManager(context: Context) {
+    private val prefs: SharedPreferences = context.getSharedPreferences(
+        "teacher_scheduler_settings", 
+        Context.MODE_PRIVATE
+    )
+    
+    companion object {
+        private const val KEY_CLASS_NOTIFICATIONS = "class_notifications_enabled"
+        private const val KEY_MEETING_NOTIFICATIONS = "meeting_notifications_enabled"
+        private const val KEY_DEFAULT_REMINDER = "default_reminder_minutes"
+        private const val KEY_AUTO_SYNC = "auto_sync_enabled"
+        private const val KEY_CURRENT_SEMESTER = "current_semester_id"
+        private const val KEY_LAST_SYNC = "last_sync_timestamp"
+    }
+    
+    fun saveSettings(settings: AppSettings) {
+        prefs.edit().apply {
+            putBoolean(KEY_CLASS_NOTIFICATIONS, settings.classNotificationsEnabled)
+            putBoolean(KEY_MEETING_NOTIFICATIONS, settings.meetingNotificationsEnabled)
+            putInt(KEY_DEFAULT_REMINDER, settings.defaultReminderMinutes)
+            putBoolean(KEY_AUTO_SYNC, settings.autoSyncEnabled)
+            putLong(KEY_CURRENT_SEMESTER, settings.currentSemesterId)
+            putLong(KEY_LAST_SYNC, settings.lastSyncTimestamp)
+            apply()
+        }
+    }
+    
+    fun getSettings(): AppSettings {
+        return AppSettings(
+            classNotificationsEnabled = prefs.getBoolean(KEY_CLASS_NOTIFICATIONS, true),
+            meetingNotificationsEnabled = prefs.getBoolean(KEY_MEETING_NOTIFICATIONS, true),
+            defaultReminderMinutes = prefs.getInt(KEY_DEFAULT_REMINDER, 15),
+            autoSyncEnabled = prefs.getBoolean(KEY_AUTO_SYNC, true),
+            currentSemesterId = prefs.getLong(KEY_CURRENT_SEMESTER, 0),
+            lastSyncTimestamp = prefs.getLong(KEY_LAST_SYNC, 0)
+        )
+    }
+    
+    fun updateLastSyncTime(timestamp: Long) {
+        prefs.edit().putLong(KEY_LAST_SYNC, timestamp).apply()
+    }
+    
+    fun setCurrentSemester(semesterId: Long) {
+        prefs.edit().putLong(KEY_CURRENT_SEMESTER, semesterId).apply()
+    }
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,172 @@
+package com.example.teacherscheduler.ui
+
+import android.app.DatePickerDialog
+import android.os.Bundle
+import android.widget.Toast
+import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.data.DataManager
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.databinding.ActivityAddEditSemesterBinding
+import com.example.teacherscheduler.model.Semester
+import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
+import java.util.*
+
+class AddEditSemesterActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
+    
+    private lateinit var binding: ActivityAddEditSemesterBinding
+    private var semesterId: Long = 0
+    private var isEditMode = false
+    private var semester: Semester? = null
+    
+    private val startCalendar = Calendar.getInstance()
+    private val endCalendar = Calendar.getInstance().apply {
+        add(Calendar.MONTH, 4) // Default 4-month semester
+    }
+    
+    private val dateFormat = SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd, yyyy", Locale.getDefault())
+    
+    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
+        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
+        binding = ActivityAddEditSemesterBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
+        setContentView(binding.root)
+        
+        // Check if we're editing an existing semester
+        semesterId = intent.getLongExtra("semester_id", 0)
+        isEditMode = semesterId != 0L
+        
+        setupToolbar()
+        setupDatePickers()
+        setupButtons()
+        
+        if (isEditMode) {
+            loadSemesterData()
+        } else {
+            // Set default dates for new semester
+            updateDateDisplay()
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupToolbar() {
+        setSupportActionBar(binding.toolbar)
+        supportActionBar?.setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled(true)
+        supportActionBar?.setDisplayShowHomeEnabled(true)
+        
+        binding.toolbar.setNavigationOnClickListener {
+            finish()
+        }
+        
+        binding.toolbarTitle.text = if (isEditMode) "Edit Semester" else "Add Semester"
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupDatePickers() {
+        binding.editStartDate.setOnClickListener {
+            showDatePicker(startCalendar) { 
+                updateDateDisplay()
+                validateDates()
+            }
+        }
+        
+        binding.editEndDate.setOnClickListener {
+            showDatePicker(endCalendar) { 
+                updateDateDisplay()
+                validateDates()
+            }
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun setupButtons() {
+        binding.buttonSave.setOnClickListener {
+            saveSemester()
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun loadSemesterData() {
+        semester = DataManager.getSemesterById(semesterId)
+        
+        semester?.let {
+            binding.editSemesterName.setText(it.name)
+            binding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked = it.isCurrentSemester
+            
+            // Set calendars to semester dates
+            startCalendar.time = it.startDate
+            endCalendar.time = it.endDate
+            
+            updateDateDisplay()
+        } ?: run {
+            Toast.makeText(this, "Error loading semester", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            finish()
+        }
+    }
+    
+    private fun showDatePicker(calendar: Calendar, onDateSet: () -> Unit) {
+        DatePickerDialog(
+            this,
+            { _, year, month, dayOfMonth ->
+                calendar.set(Calendar.YEAR, year)
+                calendar.set(Calendar.MONTH, month)
+                calendar.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, dayOfMonth)
+                onDateSet()
+            },
+            calendar.get(Calendar.YEAR),
+            calendar.get(Calendar.MONTH),
+            calendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH)
+        ).show()
+    }
+    
+    private fun updateDateDisplay() {
+        binding.editStartDate.setText(dateFormat.format(startCalendar.time))
+        binding.editEndDate.setText(dateFormat.format(endCalendar.time))
+    }
+    
+    private fun validateDates(): Boolean {
+        if (startCalendar.after(endCalendar)) {
+            Toast.makeText(this, "Start date cannot be after end date", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            return false
+        }
+        return true
+    }
+    
+    private fun saveSemester() {
+        val name = binding.editSemesterName.text.toString().trim()
+        
+        if (name.isEmpty()) {
+            binding.editSemesterName.error = "Name is required"
+            return
+        }
+        
+        if (!validateDates()) {
+            return
+        }
+        
+        val isCurrentSemester = binding.switchCurrentSemester.isChecked
+        
+        try {
+            if (isEditMode && semester != null) {
+                // Update existing semester
+                val updatedSemester = semester!!.copy(
+                    name = name,
+                    startDate = startCalendar.time,
+                    endDate = endCalendar.time,
+                    isCurrentSemester = isCurrentSemester
+                )
+                
+                DataManager.updateSemester(updatedSemester)
+                Toast.makeText(this, "Semester updated", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            } else {
+                // Create new semester
+                val newSemester = Semester(
+                    name = name,
+                    startDate = startCalendar.time,
+                    endDate = endCalendar.time,
+                    isCurrentSemester = isCurrentSemester
+                )
+                
+                DataManager.addSemester(newSemester)
+                Toast.makeText(this, "Semester added", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+            }
+            
+            finish()
+        } catch (e: Exception) {
+            Toast.makeText(this, "Error: ${e.message}", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
+        }
+    }
+}
